name: Múgica: Spell Songs
description:
One day you gonna be a great Magician, little one, but you need to learn how to cast a spell first, right? 

Múgica: "Spell Songs" is a Rhythm game that you need make the right moves to cast a spell.
How to Play
Arrow Keys to play song. 

Credits

Art, Design & Code By Nonyko

Music By LeonimuZ

Sound Effects by ZapSplat
